name: You are (NOT) alone (LambonyGames)
description:

Description:

"You're (not) Alone" is a narrative-focused video game that aims to raise awareness of bullying and harassment, particularly towards members of the LGBTQ+ community. The game follows the story of Soul, a transgender girl who has been the target of bullying and harassment throughout her life. Through Soul's memories, the player is able to experience the pain and trauma that she went through and is challenged to confront the reality of how their actions can affect others. The game seeks to educate players on the importance of empathy and acceptance, while also offering resources for those who are struggling with mental health issues or facing bullying and harassment. By sharing the powerful message of Soul's story, the game hopes to create a positive impact on the player and the wider community.
